Detailed Description

Contains logic used for generation of ARP packets.

Function Documentation

int ipwd_genarp ( char *  dev,
char *  p_sip,
char *  p_smac,
char *  p_dip,
char *  p_dmac,
int  opcode 
)

Generates ARP packet with libnet1.

Parameters:
dev Name of the device
p_sip Source IP address
p_smac Source MAC address
p_dip Destination IP address
p_dmac Destination MAC address
opcode ARPOP_REQUEST or ARPOP_REPLY
Returns:
IPWD_RV_SUCCESS if successful IPWD_RV_ERROR otherwise

char msgbuf[IPWD_MSG_BUFSIZ]

Buffer for output messages.
